title: Ms. Pat Interview, Steve's Me Time Story, Beyonce Called Out, NBA Bill Russell and more.
itunes:title: Ms. Pat Interview, Steve's Me Time Story, Beyonce Called Out, NBA Bill Russell and more.
description:
Good morning and welcome to the ride!  Cheating co-parent, no more morning sex and cologne placement are the topics covered by The CLO.  Steve shares with us his "me time" story.  Where are 6 year olds and malt liquor synonymous?  Tank speaks out and defends Beyonce because a preacher went off on one of her latest songs.  Ms. Pat stops by to talk about her new show and Steve pays her the best compliment.  Your favorite play cousin talked about Bill Russell and Deion Sanders in his Sports Report.  Would You Rather included a choice between pizza and tacos.  Today in Closing Remarks, Steve brings up a great point.  We all need a break.  Take some time for yourself because it is imperative.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
